title: 09: Investing in Your Children
dc:creator: mad hat pod
description:
In this episode grad students Jackie Stein, Liz Bell and Ceren Karacasu and Professors David Just and Vickie Bogan discuss how parents invest in their children through 529 plans and other means.
Tweet us @MadHatEconomics
Email us madhatecon@gmail.com
